dmca.title: [ABUSE] SquareTrade, Inc Copyright Abuse
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Thursday, May 18, 2006 2:00 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] SquareTrade, Inc Copyright Abuse]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] SquareTrade, Inc Copyright Abuse]


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] SquareTrade, Inc Copyright Abuse
Date:         Thu, 18 May 2006 10:48:38 -0700
From:         Kris Stevenson <krisst@squaretrade.com>
To:         abuse@theplanet.com, legal-response@theplanet.com
CC:         karen@squaretrade.com



To Whom It May Concern:

It has come to our attention that www.pilljar.com, a site registered and
or hosted by www.theplanet.com, is infringing copyrights and registered
trademarks owned by SquareTrade, Inc., and may be engaging in other
fraudulent activity. To protect our intellectual property rights, we
request that you terminate any services such as registration rights,
email services or hosting that you may be providing to this domain name,
and to take other steps as you deem necessary to protect the internet
community from this fraud.

In addition, www.pilljar.com has the SquareTrade Seal posted on their
website. They are not a SquareTrade Seal Member and are not authorized
to hold themselves out as SquareTrade or verified by SquareTrade. Their
continued use of our name and/or seal misrepresents to customers their
association with us.

Under penalty or perjury, I certify that I am authorized to act on
behalf of SquareTrade, Inc. in regards to this matter and that, to the
best of my knowledge, the information provided in the claim is true and
accurate.

If you require additional information, or have any questions regarding
this claim, I may be contacted using the information provided below.

Sincerely,


Kris Stevenson
SquareTrade, Inc.
krisst@squaretrade.com



CC: Karen Hagewood
        V.P. & G.C.


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFEbMQgvK/XpJs6oyURAoVMAJ9HrK1/t7KgZ3oXdj5/E86T8nTBDACeOYKm
FGjT/0KKdWlr3S+T6oUUJ7M=
=YEVL
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
